title: Remove Kuroshi Shirogane age from content and conditionally render age in Characters UI

requirements.summary: Remove Kuroshi Shirogane’s age from the character content configuration so no age text can be rendered for him.
acceptanceCriteria: In `animeSiteConfig.characters`, Kuroshi Shirogane no longer has `age: 13` and no age text is provided for him.

file_operations.description: Update the Kuroshi Shirogane character object to remove the `age: 13` property entirely (or make it missing/undefined) so the UI has no age value to render for him; do not replace with another age or with "Unknown".

requirements.summary: Conditionally render the age label/value in character cards only when a character has a valid age value, and omit the entire age portion (including separators) when missing.
acceptanceCriteria: Kuroshi Shirogane’s card does not display any age text (no "Age", no number, no placeholder).
Other characters with an age value continue to display age as before.
The metadata line formatting does not show extra separators (e.g., no double bullets) when age is omitted.

file_operations.description: Adjust the character metadata line to build its parts conditionally so "Age {value}" is only included when the character has a valid age (e.g., a number), and ensure the bullet separator between metadata parts is only rendered between present parts (no extra/double bullets) while keeping clan, height, and rank intact.
